name: lulc
description: A GBDX task that performs unsupervised land use land cover classification. here are six classes: vegetation, water, bare soil, clouds, shadows and unclassified.

inputPortDescriptors.name: image
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains input image. The input image must be a WV02/WV03 multispectral image which is atmospherically compensated. If more than one images are contained in this directory, one is picked arbitrarily.

inputPortDescriptors.name: vegetation
inputPortDescriptors.description: If True, the output is a vegetation mask. Default is False.

inputPortDescriptors.name: water
inputPortDescriptors.description: If True, the output is a water mask. Default is False.

inputPortDescriptors.name: soil
inputPortDescriptors.description: If True, the output is a bare soil mask. Default is False.

inputPortDescriptors.name: clouds
inputPortDescriptors.description: If True, the output is a cloud mask. Default is False.

inputPortDescriptors.name: shadows
inputPortDescriptors.description: If True, the output is a shadow mask. Default is False.

inputPortDescriptors.name: unclassified
inputPortDescriptors.description: If True, the output is an unclassified material mask. Default is False.

inputPortDescriptors.name: tiles
inputPortDescriptors.description: Number of tiles to tile input image into if it is too big. In that case, the recommended number is 2. Only use this if the default option fails. Default is 1.

inputPortDescriptors.name: verbose
inputPortDescriptors.description: If True, save algorithm config files in output directory. To be used for debugging purposes. Default is False.

inputPortDescriptors.name: bbox
inputPortDescriptors.description: Bounding box coordinates in lat/long. The format is 'W,S,E,N'. Default is None (entire input image).
